mn31:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava natike viharati ginjakavasathe.
mn31:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca nandiyo ayasma ca kimilo gosingasalavanadaye viharanti.
mn31:3.1: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena gosingasalavanadayo tenupasankami.
mn31:3.2: Addasa kho dayapalo bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
mn31:4.1: Assosi kho ayasma anuruddho dayapalassa bhagavata saddhim mantayamanassa.
mn31:4.5: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho yenayasma ca nandiyo ayasma ca kimilo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantanca nandiyam ayasmantanca kimilam etadavoca:
mn31:5.1: Atha kho ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca nandiyo ayasma ca kimilo bhagavantam paccuggantva—
mn31:5.2: eko bhagavato pattacivaram patiggahesi, eko asanam pannapesi, eko padodakam upatthapesi.
mn31:5.5: Tepi kho ayasmanto bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
mn31:5.6: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anuruddham bhagava etadavoca:
mn31:5.7: “Kacci vo, anuruddha, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci pindakena na kilamatha”ti?
mn31:5.8: “Khamaniyam, bhagava, yapaniyam, bhagava; na ca mayam, bhante, pindakena kilamama”ti.
mn31:6.1: “Kacci pana vo, anuruddha, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharatha”ti?
mn31:6.2: “Taggha mayam, bhante, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharama”ti.
mn31:6.3: “Yatha katham pana tumhe, anuruddha, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharatha”ti?
mn31:7.4: Tassa mayham, bhante, imesu ayasmantesu mettam kayakammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca;
mn31:7.5: mettam vacikammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca;
mn31:7.6: mettam manokammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca.
mn31:7.8: ‘yannunaham sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vatteyyan’ti.
mn31:7.9: So kho aham, bhante, sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vattami.
mn31:7.10: Nana hi kho no, bhante, kaya ekanca pana manne cittan”ti.
mn31:7.16: Tassa mayham, bhante, imesu ayasmantesu mettam kayakammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca,
mn31:7.17: mettam vacikammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca,
mn31:7.18: mettam manokammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca.
mn31:7.20: ‘yannunaham sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vatteyyan’ti.
mn31:7.21: So kho aham, bhante, sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vattami.
mn31:7.22: Nana hi kho no, bhante, kaya ekanca pana manne cittan”ti.
mn31:7.23: “Evam kho mayam, bhante, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharama”ti.
mn31:8.2: Kacci pana vo, anuruddha, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharatha”ti?
mn31:9.1: “Taggha mayam, bhante, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharama”ti.
mn31:9.2: “Yatha katham pana tumhe, anuruddha, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharatha”ti?
mn31:9.3: “Idha, bhante, amhakam yo pathamam gamato pindaya patikkamati so asanani pannapeti, paniyam paribhojaniyam upatthapeti, avakkarapatim upatthapeti.
mn31:9.4: Yo paccha gamato pindaya patikkamati, sace hoti bhuttavaseso sace akankhati bhunjati, no ce akankhati appaharite va chaddeti, appanake va udake opilapeti.
mn31:9.5: So asanani patisameti, paniyam paribhojaniyam patisameti, avakkarapatim patisameti, bhattaggam sammajjati.
mn31:9.6: Yo passati paniyaghatam va paribhojaniyaghatam va vaccaghatam va rittam tuccham so upatthapeti.
mn31:9.7: Sacassa hoti avisayham, hatthavikarena dutiyam amantetva hatthavilanghakena upatthapema, na tveva mayam, bhante, tappaccaya vacam bhindama.
mn31:9.8: Pancahikam kho pana mayam, bhante, sabbarattikam dhammiya kathaya sannisidama.
mn31:9.9: Evam kho mayam, bhante, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharama”ti.
mn31:10.2: Atthi pana vo, anuruddha, evam appamattanam atapinam pahitattanam viharantanam uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn31:10.4: Idha mayam, bhante, yavadeva akankhama vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharama.
mn31:10.5: Ayam kho no, bhante, amhakam appamattanam atapinam pahitattanam viharantanam uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti.
mn31:11-13.2: Etassa pana vo, anuruddha, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya atthanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn31:11-13.4: Idha mayam, bhante, yavadeva akankhama vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharama.
mn31:11-13.5: Etassa, bhante, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya ayamanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti.
mn31:14.2: Etassa pana vo, anuruddha, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya atthanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn31:14.4: Idha mayam, bhante, yavadeva akankhama pitiya ca viraga upekkhaka ca viharama, sata ca sampajana, sukhanca kayena patisamvedema, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharama.
mn31:14.5: Etassa, bhante, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya ayamanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti.
mn31:15.2: Etassa pana vo, anuruddha, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya atthanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn31:15.4: Idha mayam, bhante, yavadeva akankhama sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana, pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama, adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharama.
mn31:15.5: Etassa, bhante, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya ayamanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti.
mn31:16.2: Etassa pana vo, anuruddha, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya atthanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn31:16.4: Idha mayam, bhante, yavadeva akankhama sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharama.
mn31:16.5: Etassa, bhante, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya ayamanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti.
mn31:17.2: Etassa pana vo, anuruddha, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya atthanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn31:17.4: Idha mayam, bhante, yavadeva akankhama sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharama …pe…
mn31:17.5: sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharama …pe…
mn31:17.6: sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharama.
mn31:17.7: Etassa, bhante, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya ayamanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti.
mn31:18.2: Etassa pana vo, anuruddha, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya atthanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn31:18.4: Idha mayam, bhante, yavadeva akankhama sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharama, pannaya ca no disva asava parikkhina.
mn31:18.5: Etassa, bhante, viharassa samatikkamaya etassa viharassa patippassaddhiya ayamanno uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo.
mn31:18.6: Imamha ca mayam, bhante, phasuvihara annam phasuviharam uttaritaram va panitataram va na samanupassama”ti.
mn31:18.8: Imamha phasuvihara uttaritaro va panitataro va phasuviharo natthi”ti.
mn31:19.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantanca anuruddham ayasmantanca nandiyam ayasmantanca kimilam dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva utthayasana pakkami.
mn31:20.1: Atha kho ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca nandiyo ayasma ca kimilo bhagavantam anusamyayitva tato patinivattitva ayasma ca nandiyo ayasma ca kimilo ayasmantam anuruddham etadavocum:
mn31:20.2: “kim nu kho mayam ayasmato anuruddhassa evamarocimha:
mn31:20.3: ‘imasanca imasanca viharasamapattinam mayam labhino’ti, yam no ayasma anuruddho bhagavato sammukha yava asavanam khaya pakaseti”ti?
mn31:20.5: ‘imasanca imasanca viharasamapattinam mayam labhino’ti, api ca me ayasmantanam cetasa ceto paricca vidito:
mn31:21.1: Atha kho digho parajano yakkho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho digho parajano yakkho bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn31:21.3: yattha tathagato viharati araham sammasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputta—
mn31:21.4: ayasma ca anuruddho, ayasma ca nandiyo, ayasma ca kimilo”ti.
mn31:21.5: Dighassa parajanassa yakkhassa saddam sutva bhumma deva saddamanussavesum:
mn31:21.7: yattha tathagato viharati araham sammasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputta—
mn31:21.8: ayasma ca anuruddho, ayasma ca nandiyo, ayasma ca kimilo”ti.
mn31:21.9: Bhummanam devanam saddam sutva catumaharajika deva …pe…
mn31:21.17: yattha tathagato viharati araham sammasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputta—
mn31:21.18: ayasma ca anuruddho, ayasma ca nandiyo, ayasma ca kimilo”ti.
mn31:21.19: Itiha te ayasmanto tena khanena tena layena tena muhuttena yava brahmaloka vidita ahesum.
mn31:22.2: Yasmapi, digha, kula ete tayo kulaputta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, tancepi kulam ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittam anussareyya, tassapassa kulassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.3: Yasmapi, digha, kulaparivatta ete tayo kulaputta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, so cepi kulaparivatto ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapassa kulaparivattassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.4: Yasmapi, digha, gama ete tayo kulaputta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, so cepi gamo ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapassa gamassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.5: Yasmapi, digha, nigama ete tayo kulaputta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, so cepi nigamo ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapassa nigamassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.6: Yasmapi, digha, nagara ete tayo kulaputta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, tancepi nagaram ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittam anussareyya, tassapassa nagarassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.7: Yasmapi, digha, janapada ete tayo kulaputta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, so cepi janapado ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapassa janapadassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.8: Sabbe cepi, digha, khattiya ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitta anussareyyum, sabbesanampassa khattiyanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.11: sabbe cepi, digha, sudda ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitta anussareyyum, sabbesanampassa suddanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.12: Sadevako cepi, digha, loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitta anussareyya, sadevakassapassa lokassa samarakassa sabrahmakassa sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn31:22.13: Passa, digha, yava ete tayo kulaputta bahujanahitaya patipanna bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya, atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
mn31:22.15: Attamano digho parajano yakkho bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
